Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jug
Description: Jug with a spherical body with a wide and rather tall cylindrical neck. The lip is tall and flat with a convex extremity. There is a spout for pouring. An oblique handle joins the lip to the shoulder. The base is annular. The upper section of the body is pierced by two holes.
